title: A Giant people: the Watussi of Africa
creator_credit: George Herzog and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: A historical record of a traditional tribal culture as it existed in the 1930’s. Shows family life in a royal Watusi household, activities within the cattle-based economic system and ancient Watusi ceremonies and dances.
title_for_label: A Giant people: the Watussi of Africa
description: A historical record of a traditional tribal culture as it existed in the 1930’s. Shows family life in a royal Watusi household, activities within the cattle-based economic system and ancient Watusi ceremonies and dances.
